name: Roll 'em up (ITIHA)
description:
Help dicey to roll the bad numbers that stole Dice Rollers dough!

In this semi-randomized top-down beat em up, you take the role of a dice that must roll to defeat your enemies, but there's a catch! Every time you roll your number will change and you'll have to change strategies to be able to defeat the bad numbers!

This was coded solely by me, following a bunch of internet tutorials and some unity books. I took the challenge to learn Unity as much as I could in only one month, so even if the game might look a bit clunky, I'm proud of it😁.

The controls are just WASD or arrow keys to move (there is a bug with diagonal movement for arrow keys so I recommend WASD), and space bar or left mouse button to roll, now let's get rolling!

Maybe in the future I'll add a boss fight, maybe...
